title: Adani Electricity Mumbai tops discoms rating chart, Torrent Power Surat 2nd
description: Adani Electricity Mumbai topped the performance ranking of power distribution companies for 2022-23. Torrent Power Surat and Torrent Power Ahmedabad secured the second and third spots. The ranking is based on the 12th edition of Integrated Rating of Discoms released by Union Minister for Power and New & Renewable Energy R K Singh.
